Title: nomojo day 14
Content:
Billy
¬ìMeow! Meow! Meow!¬î That was the melodious song my mother, Florence Ruehl, heard emanating from the bedroom one morning as she was cleaning the breakfast dishes in the kitchen. This startled her because, although inveterate ailurophiles, my parents did not own a cat!
	When she ventured in to investigate, she was shocked to see a plump black tabby with a thick fluffy tail atop the dresser, pawing through her jewelry. He promptly hopped off, approached her meowing, and rubbed his soft fur through her legs. Of course, she could not resist his charms and began stroking him, including a loud cascade of delighted purrs. She also poured a saucer of milk for him, which he quickly lapped up.
	Then, the feline introduced himself to me, his furry body against mine. At the time, I was a three-year-old toddler, and while I certainly do not remember many of the events of that period, I have a vivid recollection of enjoying playing with this kitty!
	Later, my mother opened the front door and he scampered off. But, she was still thoroughly perplexed as to how he had gained entry to our domicile. At the time, we had just moved into a unit in Philadelphia that was actually the second floor of a home that had been converted into an apartment by the owners after their adult son had moved out on his own. When she mentioned the incident to them, Florence was informed that the cat was their own Billy, and that he considered the upper level his domain, even if it was occupied by another family. 
	From then on, Billy paid us a regular morning social call, making the rounds of the apartment as though he were a feudal lord inspecting his estate. 
	After several days, Florence still had not figured out how Billy was getting in. Because this was a sweltering summer, she kept the windows open,but all were screened. One morning, she decided to maintain a vigil, awaiting Billy¬ís arrival to find out how he entered. And that was when she learned that he was truly a cat burglar. He apparently had used his claws to widen a small tear in the bathroom window screen, and despite his girth, was able to deftly squeeze through it and into his kingdom. 
	While Florence initially enjoyed his intrusions, she became decidedly unhinged one day when Billy, on his favorite spot on the dresser, swatted a compact onto the floor, creating a powdery mess for her to clean up. Then and there, she decided to block his entr√©e by taping a piece of cardboard over the screen opening. There would be no more uninvited trespassing by Billy!
	But the next morning, unbeknownst to her, Billy, with the sagacity of an animal Einstein, used his claws to push away the cardboard barrier and enter once again. No one was going to deny him entry to his realm! She was asleep on the sofa when Billy suddenly pounced onto her chest, yowling loudly and persistently. She could not believe that he was back again, and could not understand what all the caterwauling was about, which was atypical for Billy. Then, he leapt onto the floor, still wailing, as though trying to sound an alarm. 
	She followed him as he led her to me, lying on the kitchen floor, choking to death! My mother slapped me several times on the back (the Heimlich maneuver had not yet been invented), and dislodged a chunk of chocolate chip cookie that had stuck in my throat. Billy had saved my life, and he became an instant hero with my mother. She even widened the hole in the screen to make sure Billy would not scratch his fur when shimmying in! 	
	As an incredible footnote, despite this experience, I still have a pronounced fondness for chocolate chip cookies. ¬ñDr. Franklin Ruehl, Ph.D

Title: nomojo day 15
Content:
I don‚Äôt have much to write about. School seems to be getting interesting. One of my friends dropped out and me and April might not be far behind. If I don‚Äôt pass this class this time I‚Äôm done for good. So a lot of pressure to get my butt in gear and pass this class. The good thing is at least there are some people I know in this class so it hopefully won‚Äôt suck that bad and there will be no annoying, bitchy chicks like last time. 
Other than that not much of excitement going on. I went on Jess‚Äôs facebook page and pretended to be him and was talking to Bridezilla. I found it very funny that she kept asking when Jess got off work like she wanted to make sure he was the one Russ talked to. So I made a comment saying I know you and Russ don‚Äôt care for Shell but if I‚Äôm not home she can relay the message to me. I found it interesting that she didn‚Äôt say anything about me in the reply. Jess‚Äôs mom I guess called them trying to get our numbers but I guess they didn‚Äôt give it to her. I find it interesting that she can remember Russ‚Äôs number but they can‚Äôt remember ours. That crap pisses me off and gives us even more reason not to associate with them. I‚Äôm guessing it was about Thanksgiving but who knows. I highly doubt Jess will call her to find out. Last year they called about Thanksgiving time to tell us they were gonna be going to one of the uncles houses but our problem is we never know what Jess will be working so we can‚Äôt make plans and he can‚Äôt request it off either. 
Work isn‚Äôt too bad. I got my evaluation towards the end of October and it wasn‚Äôt too good. My supervisor was basically saying I don‚Äôt do anything around Marjorie‚Äôs house which is bullshit. I bust my ass cleaning her apartment but it‚Äôs hard to do when she has appointments all the time and now she is going through stuff in her place because she might be moving into a assisted living place soon. I tried to explain why I‚Äôm not able to vaccum or sweep and mop. I can‚Äôt because she has stuff everywhere and it‚Äôs hard to move the stuff which I explained to my supervisor. It‚Äôs just crazy. So now next week on Monday she is coming to sit down with me, Marjorie and her daughter to see how I‚Äôm doing. It should be interesting.

Title: nomojo day 17
Content:
Tonight was my first night of my class for this quarter. It went really well. The teacher is 10x better than the other one we had the first time I took the class. She is a vet so that should help. Our labs should be interesting because they said if the weather is bad then they would call off lab which is awesome. So now I‚Äôm not so worried about that whole thing. I‚Äôm gonna carpool with another girl in our class because then I won‚Äôt have to drive lol. 
Other than that not much else going on.

Title: nomojo day 18 /DCFS Ruling
Content: Sorry I didn‚Äôt write yesterday but I think I had a touch of some kind of bug because let‚Äôs just say I was visiting the restroom quite a lot and didn‚Äôt get much sleep because of it which in turn made me have a HORRIBLE headache. I checked the mail yesterday and noticed 2 envelopes with DCFS in the corner. One was addressed to me and the other addressed to Jess. So I opened mine and it basically said that the investigation into the train track incident was unfounded. I was so happy. So that‚Äôs great news that I‚Äôm not a child abuser lol. I get very angry with my son but I would never abuse him. So that was yesterday‚Äôs big news.

Title: nomojo day 19
Content:
So today I got my house in top shape. I‚Äôm proud that I actually cleaned the WHOLE thing. It looks quite nice. I‚Äôm trying to get laundry done now. It sucks so much that we have to go downstairs and out into the cold to get to the basement. I can‚Äôt believe next week is Thanksgiving. Time just flew right by. It will just be the family for Thanksgiving unless Marjorie‚Äôs daughter blows her off for Thanksgiving again this year. Her daughter has this weird thing with not having both of her parents for Thanksgiving dinner just one. I asked Marjorie if her and her ex husband fight and she said they actually get along better since they have been divorced. So I don‚Äôt understand why her daughter doesn‚Äôt want them both there to celebrate. I would have invited Marjorie over last year but I had invited my friend Melisa and her family which turned into a disaster. From getting bitched at because I asked them to bring a few items to her daughter sitting there screaming her head off while her bf just sat there and didn‚Äôt even bother to try to comfort her. I will definitely not be inviting them again. The in-laws we have no clue what is going on with them but since they can‚Äôt even remember our numbers not too worried about them. 
Well I guess that‚Äôs it for now.

Title: nomojo day 20
Content: not much excitement going on. I found out the lady I work is gonna be moving like the week after next week so now it‚Äôs a crunch thing to get a different job. I‚Äôm quitting once she leaves because I‚Äôm getting burned out from the job and don‚Äôt really enjoy it anymore. The bad part is they are just now deciding to give me a raise. So that sucks that they wait until I‚Äôm tired of the job to decide to give a raise WTF. So either way I‚Äôm gonna be looking for a different job. So we‚Äôll see how it goes. Hopefully it won‚Äôt take long to find one with the holiday season going on.

Title: nomojo day 20
Content:
Well today wasn‚Äôt too horrible. I had to go for my inservice for work and there was a lady who was talking about her 11 year old daughter who died of a brain cancer. 
 src=‚Äùhttp://player.vimeo.com/video/5880572″ width=‚Äù400‚Ä≥ height=‚Äù270‚Ä≥ frameborder=‚Äù0‚Ä≥>
The Story of Sydney Ives from Jeremy Wells on Vimeo.
It was so heartbreaking to hear this mom‚Äôs story and for all the parents out there it makes you think if your child was going through it would you be that strong. I liked the way her mom said that every medical decision they made she was in on it and that they didn‚Äôt just lay around and not live their lives because of the cancer. The mom also told the daughter that when God came for her that it was ok to go.

Title: nomojo day 21
Content: Well still debating about the job quitting. I found out something interesting the other day at our inservice meeting. The place where my friend Lil Michelle would be going through is now connected to my work but the problem is if they can‚Äôt get her hours figured out I won‚Äôt be able to work for which would suck so it‚Äôs kinda a wait and see deal. Other than that not much else exciting going on.

Title: nomojo day 23/tornado
Content:
Well today wasn‚Äôt too bad of a day or I should say at least the beginning of the day wasn‚Äôt horrible. I was supposed to have a meeting with my supervisor and Marjorie but the supervisor never showed and so I called the office to find out what was going on and so we rescheduled for Wednesday. So that should be interesting especially since Marjorie‚Äôs place looks like a disaster because she has been packing things to move and there isn‚Äôt even space for me to move anything off of the floor to sweep,vaccum or mop so we‚Äôll see what Aubrey says. 
Then after work me and Jess took the dogs for a walk because it was a absolutely beautiful day out before he had to go to work. Then me and my mom went to pick up Kacey from school and went to Lil Caesar‚Äôs to get some breadsticks and to Logli‚Äôs to get some items. Well by the time we got home the sky wasn‚Äôt looking too pretty. As I was going up the stairs to my apartment the tornado siren went off so I‚Äôm running around trying to gather up cats to put in their carrier and trying to watch one of the local news stations to find out where exactly the tornado was. So I ended up finding out that the tornado was in our county but kinda in between our county and the next one and was heading towards the other county so that was a relief . The tornado was about a 1/2 mile wide from what I heard and did some darn good damage to the towns it hit. There was even a report of a school bus that got flipped over by the tornado. There was 6 kids on the bus but luckily none had life threatening injuries so that was good to hear. So quite a eventful night. It‚Äôs much calmer now but COLD. I guess that‚Äôs all for now.

Title: nomojo day 23
Content:
Not much going on around here or I should say nothing of real excitement. Thank god for Thanksgiving I get a nice 4 day weekend but depending on when Marjorie is officially moving I might not be working next week either. I tried to go around town asking to see if anyone knew of any places that could do the assessment so my friend Lil Michelle could get some hours so I could come work for her since my work now works with the place that could pay me to work for her but the way it‚Äôs looking that isn‚Äôt gonna happen so I might as well tell them I‚Äôm gonna quit. 
I have been putting in applications to different places so we‚Äôll see how that goes. Just keep trying to find a different job. I wanted to have a different job before I quit this one but don‚Äôt really want to get another client before I find one. So that‚Äôs what has been going on.

Title: nomojo day 24
Content:
I never got to be the part of the meeting today for work. When I got there the supervisor lady was getting ready to leave and she said to wait until after Thanksgiving to go over the meeting they had. So hopefully that‚Äôs nothing bad. I also found out that Marjorie isn‚Äôt moving until the 15th so that helps with my job search hopefully I‚Äôll be able to find a new job or get Lil Michelle approved before marjorie  moves into her new place. Other than that not much else going on. 
Hope everyone has a awesome thanksgiving with friends and family.

Title: nomojo day 25,26
Content: Well since my numbering is off and I didn‚Äôt write yesterday because of Thanksgiving (Thursday)I‚Äôll write some. My thanksgiving was nothing super special. My brother came over so that was nice. We ate and played wii most of the night lol. Other than that I think my school money is FINALLY gonna be coming in which is nice because it will be just in time for Christmas. We just have to figure out what exactly we are gonna do with it. I know for sure we are using part of it for bills and the car repairs. Hopefully after that we will have some for x-mas if not then at least the bills will be a bit ahead and we can use our paychecks for x-mas or at least most of them for that. So we have to draw up a plan and figure out how much the bills will come up to. Other than that not much going on.

Title: i just wanna scream
Content:
I‚Äôm going to school for vet tech and before I even started this quarter I checked with financial aid about it being covered because our school has a policy if you‚Äôre only taking one class then it‚Äôs not covered or at least at the time that was the rumor I was hearing so I went to check with financial aid. I was told that I wouldn‚Äôt be getting my grant money but I would still get my loans. They had screwed up on my loan for last quarter and didn‚Äôt know what to put on the paper so I had to redo it like 2 times. So my money is FINALLY in from last quarter that they owed me but they ask me if I want to use most of that money to pay for this class because I only got my grant money and not my loan money. 
I‚Äôm fucked either way. If I drop the class I now have to pay for it because it‚Äôs already past the 1st week which is when you can drop it without having to pay. So if I drop out of the class and wait until next quarter I will still have to pay for it or at least what I have attended which I have no clue how they figure that out. Besides I‚Äôm not even sure if they will let me drop the class because it is a retake one. 
I don‚Äôt think I should have to give up the money they owed me because they fucked up. I was gonna use the money for bills, getting one of our cars fixed and x-mas gifts and that‚Äôs what I intend to do. So now I don‚Äôt know what is gonna happen. 
Then the lady7 I work for is leaving the place I work for on 20th of this month and I was planning on quitting unless my friend Lil Michelle was able to get assessed and then I could work for her but I‚Äôm not sure if that would happen. So I have been busting my butt looking for another job. At this point I‚Äôll work wherever. I was trying to get a job cashiering or stocking since I like those two types the most besides trying to get into a vet tech job or at least something associated with animals so I can get my foot in the door. My friend who dropped out said to e-mail all the clinics in our area to see ifI could get a job so that is what I‚Äôm gonna do and see where it leads me.

Title: interesting visit with the dr
Content:
My doctors appointment to get my Implanion removed was very interesting. They were trying to find it and they couldn‚Äôt. They took me up to a different floor to do an ultrasound and they still couldn‚Äôt find it so then they sent me over to the hospital for a better ultrasound and they found it right away over there so then I had to go back over to the doctor‚Äôs office and they were able to take it out and put a new one in. So it was an interesting day. I‚Äôm glad I got most of my x-mas shopping done. I‚Äôm still trying to find a different job since the lady I work for is going to be moving on the 20th. Hopefully I‚Äôll get one soon. If not I‚Äôll have to do something like clean people‚Äôs houses or something on the side to make some extra money. I‚Äôll figure something out. I was tempted to charge people like 5 dollars to trim their pets nails or something like that. Other than that not much else going on. 
I figured out the financial aid crap for this quarter and now have to figure out for next quarter. I have the option of taking my last gen ed and being covered but having to take  my externship by itself which means I would have to pay for it. The cost would be around 1,200 or taking the class by itself and having to pay 457 but being covered for the externship. I don‚Äôt have the money to pay for that one class so I‚Äôm thinking of doing the gen ed with it and then I can save up money for the externship.

Title: I‚Äôm so pissed at Jess right now
Content: Today I was sitting around messing with Jess‚Äôs phone and I went into his text messages to start deleting some of the old ones because he never does and I happened to open up a text message that I didn‚Äôt understand until I happened to open up a pic of a hot looking half naked chick. My mom was here with us so I didn‚Äôt really get into it with him but I‚ÄôM PISSED. According to him this chick is a lesbian but can someone please tell me why would a lesbian be sending a half naked pic of herself to a guy then. I don‚Äôt buy it. I was trying to find a text message he sent back to her but mysteriously there wasn‚Äôt one so either I deleted it the other day without realizing it or he deleted it. So I texted the ho from his phone and told her not to be sending any more half naked pics of herself to him and that it was a tad inappropriate. If she had sent a pic to him with ALL her clothes I wouldn‚Äôt have such a problem with it because he has the right to have female friends as well but the fact that this chick was half naked in the pic got me wondering is something going on I should be worried about. I‚Äôm half way scared to ask him because he wouldn‚Äôt lie to me and if I found out that he was fucking this chick we would be done. I made the mistake of cheating on him when we first started dating but I have NEVER done it since then and I never would. I‚Äôm tempted like everyone else is but I have resisted. I know my weight is a issue to him whether he wants to admit it or not. I wish I could be the weight I was when we first got together. We don‚Äôt have sex anymore which got me wondering is there something going on or is he really tired and not in the mood. I don‚Äôt know what to do. I want to trust him and not be the crazy jealous chick. I guess we‚Äôll see what happens. I don‚Äôt need this shit though not with christmas so close and my birthday not too far after that. I don‚Äôt expect many people to show for my birthday if any. So I guess I‚Äôm gonna go to bed and hopefully by me ignoring him tomorrow maybe he will tell me what‚Äôs going on. We‚Äôll see.

Title: ok feel stupid
Content:
So I kept making smartass comments to Jess and he finally asked me what I was talking about and so I told him I found the pic of the half naked girl and how he said she was a student at his school so he asked what pic I was talking about and I showed him the pic and he was like I never seen her before. I believe him because he‚Äôs very honest with me so he asked if that was why I was mad at him yesterday and I said yes. 

So now I feel stupid that I got all pissed about the chick and he had no clue what I was talking about. He thought I was talking about a elf mooning people text message one of his students had sent to him lol. So we figured things out and everything is good again.
Tomorrow is my last day of working for Marjorie.So I need to start looking for another job which I have been filling out applications like crazy. I applied at k-mart, target, wal-mart, pizza hut, subway, a us cellular job, receptionist job, animal related jobs. I‚Äôm trying pretty much everything I can think of and will keep doing it until I get a job. Right now we are on break from school which is definitely awesome. So I get to relax for a while.

Title: Christmas sucked
Content:
I don‚Äôt know what it is about the holidays. A few years ago me and Jess got the stomach flu on New Years. Then there was the Thanksgiving after I had Kacey where I almost had to spend it in the hospital because I had to get my gallbladder removed. This year I get the stomach flu on Christmas. It‚Äôs crazy. As far as gifts were concerned I didn‚Äôt get too much. I got the biggest loser wii game, my fitness coach 2, 10 minute workout all wii games. My mom got me mario party 8 and jeopardy for the wii. Jess also got me a pair of tan pants, a workout outfit that I have to lose weight to fit in, a beautiful orange sweatshirt with wolves on it. My mom got a devotional book from me, a chicken soup book about what i learned from my cat, a bookmark, a pair of slippers, a $10 gift card. My brother got the michael jackson wii game and michael jackson video collection dvd. Jess got 2 workout outfits and the karate kid dvd. Kacey got 2 3 in 1 lego houses, a football and basketball set, a thomas the train pack n go train set, a extra thomas the train figure like 2 or 3 of those, 5 mini monster trucks and a monster truck track, a thing to help him read, shrek forever after dvd set and I think that‚Äôs it. So gifts weren‚Äôt too bad.
I didn‚Äôt start feeling sick unti like 8pm on x-mas and by the time 1:30am rolled around I couldn‚Äôt even keep water down so that‚Äôs when I decided it was time to go to the E.R. When they were doing the triage the nurse asked if I had ever had a fast heartbeat to which I told her no so that was kinda scary to hear. So I have spent the past 2 days sick. I did lose 7 pounds. Me and my friend Ginny went job hunting today so hopefully we‚Äôll get a call some time soon. 
My birthday is Thursday but I‚Äôm gonna wait until Sunday to have my party. We were originally gonna have it a local bowling alley but almost everyone seems to be too poor to afford it and I would feel bad if I had a party but no one got to join in on the fun so I was thinking of having the party at my house. I‚Äôm not exactly sure what we are gonna do though if as many people come as they said they are going to. Probably just play party games that we have and just do teams. 
So that has been my x-mas. I will have to post pics on here soon from x-mas.

Title: Birthday/new years
Content:
Well my birthday wasn‚Äôt too exciting. I went bowling with my friend Ginny and Kacey and my mom took me out to eat afterwards. We got a few things here and there which my mom paid for. Then for New Years my friends Ginny and her husband came over because Jess had to go to bed early so they came over to keep me company. Then yesterday Jess took me out for a belated birthday present since he actually didn‚Äôt get me anything not even a card. Today was my birthday party. Not too many people showed up but that‚Äôs a usual thing for me. We had some fun and that‚Äôs all that matter. 
Other than that I worked out a few days ago but overworked some muscles so I had to wait a few days to work out again. Tomorrow I‚Äôm going to work out while Kacey is at school. I hope this year I can lose some weight. I learned a very depressing thing today. One of our games called 7 Deadly Sins had a sin where I had to guess what everyone‚Äôs weights were. Two of my friends look heavier than me but they actually weigh less which is really bad. So I‚Äôm going to bust my butt working out to get this damn weight off. I‚Äôm tired of it and since I‚Äôm not working I need to focus on something besides sitting on my butt even though sitting on my butt seems so darn nice.

Title: crappy lab
Content:
Yesterday was an interesting day to say the least. I met this girl named Brandy and my friend Mary at school to take Brandy‚Äôs jeep to go to Janesville for our large animal class lab. So poor Brandy was already having a crappy day. It was her birthday and her hubby didn‚Äôt even say happy birthday or get her anything and they ended up fighting most of the day. Then we ended up getting lost on our way up there and being late to lab. Not to mention the fact that we almost ended up in a accident when a semi decided to switch lanes and almost pinned us between him and the guardrail. 
The actual lab went ok. The goat I had kept trying to eat my sweatpants, boots, and even tried to bite me. He even resorted to chewing on the wood for the stall. The sheeps weren‚Äôt horribly bad. We had to ‚Äútip‚Äù them lol. It sounds funny and looks funny too. So thankfully the return trip back to Rockford wasn‚Äôt eventful.
I have been working out except for yesterday because I figured that I would be getting enough working out working with the goats and sheep. Hopefully it pays off in the end. I‚Äôm gonna try really hard to stick with it. 
Let‚Äôs see the only other thing to really report on is Lil Shell. She is getting better and better. Right now the only thing she needs to work on is being able to walk. Her feeding tube got taken out of her stomach, she can take her pills by mouth, she was just taken off one of her meds, she can talk quite well, her arm seems to be improving. I was talking to Amanda the girl that was in the crash with her and Amanda said that Lil Shell was apologizing to Amanda for the accident. Amanda told her it wasn‚Äôt her fault at all and it was the dumb drunk moron. I texted Lil Shell yesterday to ask about when her appointment in Chicago was today and told her it‚Äôs not her fault at all and to NEVER blame herself. It was the stupid moron who decided to drink and drive. I‚Äôm just so proud of her that she is trying so hard. I found out something very interesting. I had went on Youtube quite a while ago to see if I could find a video of the guy who hit Lil Michelle. Well I came across a video with his name so I left a comment asking if he was from Freeport and if he was involved in a car accident. Well it turns out that the video was shot by his former friend and the reason the guy took the video was to show to everyone how dangerous the guy was. So I asked if the guy could send the video to me or to Lil Michelle and Amanda‚Äôs attorney because it might help with their case. So far I haven‚Äôt heard anything back from the guy so I guess I‚Äôll have to wait and see. 
So that‚Äôs my update for now.

Title: weight
Content:
I started working out probably the beginning of this week and I‚Äôve lost about 2 pounds so far but it keeps flucatating so it drives me crazy because I‚Äôll eat dinner and then work out when Kacey goes to bed. I do 3 different workout wii games. I do one called Fitness trainer 2 fitness and nutrition. Then I do my wii fit plus and then I do MJ or one called gold‚Äôs gym dance workout so I‚Äôm on for about 30 minutes to an hour all together. I‚Äôm trying very hard to ween myself off of pop. So far I‚Äôm not doing too bad. I was proud of myself today when I went grocery shopping because I didn‚Äôt buy any pop and got a lot of juice. I‚Äôm trying very hard because I want to get rid of this weight. I will try to keep everyone updated on my weight loss hopefully I will able to lose a lot and keep it off. 
Other than that not much else of excitement going on. Still looking for a job and still going to school. I get to take next quarter off because 2 classes weren‚Äôt available. So yea that‚Äôs my boring life. Hope everyone has a more exciting life than me.

Title: slaughterhouse
Content:
Today I had to go to a slaughterhouse in a nearby town as part of a school field trip. Believe me if I had a choice I wouldn‚Äôt go. This was my second time going so I already knew pretty much what to expect so it wasn‚Äôt horrible. I actually have pics I‚Äôm going to share at the end of this entry. Just to warn people there are a few pics that might be a bit gory so if you don‚Äôt like blood and guts you might not want to look at them. I‚Äôll try to put the blood and gut ones towards the bottom. The good thing is I don‚Äôt have to go to class tomorrow night. Well here is the pics

Title: figured i‚Äôd update
Content:
I don‚Äôt have much to really update about but figured since it‚Äôs been a while I might as well. I have been doing pretty good at exercising, eating right and I have actually been losing weight. Today when I weighed myself I was down to 275. So I‚Äôve lost about 5 pounds so definitely happy about that. My friend Ginny is gonna come over Wedsnesday to work out. We are gonna do DDR and try to switch between the different work out wii games I have. She asked if we could play my MJ experience game but she said she wasn‚Äôt gonna grab her crotch I thought that was hilarious because most of the dances he‚Äôs grabbing himself lol. Other than that quarter for school is almost over. We have about 3 or 4 more weeks I believe. We have one more lab up in Janesville which I‚Äôm so happy about because the last lab we went to in Janesville didn‚Äôt go so good. We got lost and then almost got ran off the road by a semi. I will be so happy when this quarter is over.
Next quarter I‚Äôm taking off because only one of the classes I was going to take was available and there is no way I would be able to pay another 427 especially since I don‚Äôt have a job right now. Kacey‚Äôs ADHD meds were running out so I went to go pick up the prescription from the doctor and I spoke with her about Kacey and his sleep problems so she told me to start giving him Melatonin and since then he‚Äôs been sleeping much better. Before we would have to put him to bed at 9-10 just to get him to sleep until 7 and even then sometimes he wouldn‚Äôt stay asleep until then. We also have tried something different with his meds. We give him his normal dose in the morning and then instead of giving it to him at noon like we were we have been giving it to him at 10 and it actually has been helping. Jess isn‚Äôt too thrilled about Kacey taking the melatonin I told him melatonin is a hormone that is already in his body but since he‚Äôs ADHD that he just doesn‚Äôt have enough of it. After that he shut up about it. I understand where Jess is coming from with the meds but without them Kacey would be 10x more harder to handle and with Jess at work or karate who gets stuck with him. I DO. The change with his ADHD med is because he seems to burn it more quickly because he‚Äôs more active so we might have to up it to 15mg instead of 10. 
The search for a job is still on. I haven‚Äôt found anything yet. Jess was talking about getting a 2nd one. 
I haven‚Äôt updated about Lil Shell in a while so I figured I would say some things so if I said these already sorry. She got her feeding tube out of her stomach towards the beginning of December, she can eat food, she has been working on walking, and her mom said she can now leave her by herself for a hour or two. I‚Äôm so happy she is doing so good. I told her when Spring comes we are going for a ‚Äúroad trip‚Äù and going to the bike path so the girl can get out of the house since she can‚Äôt really good many places because of still being in the chair but even if she still in the chair I‚Äôll take her somewhere. I know her temperature has some issues so that‚Äôs another reason I would rather wait until spring and warmer weather. She is doing so well though. I have different websites with her story on it. There is http://www.carepages.com/users/6222993/profile, http://www.caringbridge.org/visit/michellemorin
so if anyone wants to visit those pages and leave any words of encouragent she would love that. You don‚Äôt have to know her. Other than that nothing much else going on.

Title: stuff
Content:
not much of anything really going on. Kacey has been getting in the habit of lying about things and it‚Äôs beginning to tick me off. I was putting laundry away a few days ago and I found my LINK card cut in half. So I asked Kacey about it and he claimed he didn‚Äôt do it so when Jess got home later that day I asked him if he had cut up the LINK card to which he said‚Äù no why would I?‚Äù So I went back to Kacey to adamantly said it wasn‚Äôt him. Something isn‚Äôt right. I didn‚Äôt cut up the LINK card, Jess didn‚Äôt cut up the LINK and supposedly Kacey didn‚Äôt cut up the LINK card so what happened? Kacey is either a very good actor or he honestly didn‚Äôt do it because he actually started crying and he usually doesn‚Äôt do that if he actually did it. So I‚Äôm at a loss as to what happened to it. Either way I needed a new one so I requested a replacement one. Other stuff he has lied about too lately though so I‚Äôm not sure what is going on but hopefully it stops soon. 
Other than that I am now down to 273 from 280 so I must be doing something right. I have wii fit plus and it‚Äôs hilarious because I had originally set a goal I think it was 3 lbs for 2 weeks well I didn‚Äôt think I would achieve the goal so I lowered it to 2.5 lbs. So the other day I was on it and it said that I was reaching my goal at a good rate because I only had 7 days left to complete it. Today I got on and only needed to lose like 0. 2 or something like that. So I worked out and reweighed myself and actually reached the goal. Then it says I‚Äôm concerned about your health because you‚Äôre losing weight so fast or something along those lines LOL. Wii fit plus cracks me up. 
There was one time before that Jess got on and it asked him if I looked slimmer so he said yes well the next time I got on it told me that someone said I looked slimmer and that it was concerned about my health again. WTH too funny. 
I have been trying to lose weight and have been trying to eat healthier. I still drink pop but only one can a day until my pop is gone and then I won‚Äôt be buying any more. I have stopped eating candy,cookies and anything really sweet. I think you can have candy and cookies and things like that as long as you set limits for yourself. I used to eat a whole container of cookies in one sitting. Now I say ok I‚Äôm gonna have 6 cookies today for dessert. I‚Äôm determined to lose this annoying weight because I want to get healthier and feel better too. I have to get this sleep issue figured out. I literally sleep 12 hours which I‚Äôm pretty darn sure is not normal and that is even with my CPAP machine so something is not right there. I need to stop procrastinating and call the sleep lab place to schedule an appointment because before christmas I went and had the sleep study done again because I had gained so much weight that they thought I might need a different setting for my CPAP machine so we‚Äôll see what they say since I‚Äôm losing weight. 

Well guess that‚Äôs my update for now. I think I have 2 more weeks in this quarter for school and then I get a break for a quarter.

Title: geez are you for real?
Content: So today I get a call from my friend Melissa and Tammy‚Äôs mom asking if I would be willing to take them to Sycamore because the dad has a court date on Wedsnesday. I told them I would need at least 50 bucks to fill my tank. They reply back with they don‚Äôt have 50 and they think that‚Äôs a tad much to be paying me for gas so in the end they offer me 15 bucks. Sycamore is almost an hour away from where we live. I have a newer mini van that takes a LOT of gas to fill. Our gas gauge is broken so it doesn‚Äôt register the right amount of gas which is why I wanted to fill the tank to make sure I wouldn‚Äôt get stranded somewhere. I explained all this to them. This is not the first time they have asked me to take them places. For my birthday party I was nice to come get them from Melissa‚Äôs house but then had to take the mom and Tammy to their house on the opposite side of town and they only gave me 2 or 3 bucks for gas. With gas being over 3 I can‚Äôt afford to waste the gas I have. I‚Äôm all for helping out my friends but to me it seems like they are trying to take advantage all  because they don‚Äôt have their van. I kept telling them to go where we go to get our vehicles but they were insistent on going to the place where they got a broken down truck from that barely worked. So in the end I kinda lied and said I had to take my mom to a doctor‚Äôs appointment to which they tried the guilty thing saying their dad would go to jail then. Most people know about court dates at least a few months in advance I‚Äôm not understanding why they would wait until the last minute to get someone to take them without having a backup plan or saving up money to take a cab there. It just makes me mad that they would try to put it on me to take them somewhere when they should have thought things through.

Title: OMG tons of snow
Content: Well tonight I took my final. Hope I got a good grade or good enough to pass. I had a B in the class before the final so hopefully I do pretty well and it doesn‚Äôt go down too much. Another interesting thing tomorrow evening we are supposed to get from 5-16 inches of snow. Not looking forward to that. Hopefully we get the lesser amount of snow. Other than that not much else going on. Still working on losing weight and eating healthier. Well I guess that‚Äôs it for now.

Title: blizzard/neighbor drama
Content:
Well in my neck of the woods we had a wonderful blizzard Tuesday night into Wedsnesday. I took a lot of pics during it. It was very interesting. We ended up with 14.3 inches of snow. My fiancee had to work on Wednesday so he ended up having to walk to work which is almost a mile from where we live because our cars were stuck in our driveway. This leads to my neighbor drama part of things. Our neighbors got a new garage courtesy of our city or I think they went half and half for it. Either way the new garage is on the other side of their house and it‚Äôs a nice garage. The old one is supposed to be getting torn down but who knows when. The thing I don‚Äôt understand is why they wouldn‚Äôt use their new garage and park their nice NEW car in front of the old garage. Christmas eve me and my mom had gone out the day before and I pulled the van in front of her house so she could get her groceries out and it would be a shorter distance for her. Well I forgot to move the van all the way back in our driveway so I go outside to move the car and the neighbor is out there bitching at me so I asked her why she couldn‚Äôt park in the new garage. Her response was they taken apart their SUV that they had given to one of their sons. She then went on to rant about how she pays taxes for the driveway and all this other bullshit. I told her take it up with our landlord then because if our landlord let us use one of the 4 garages he has useless shit in we would be able to put Jess‚Äôs car in and I would be able to just leave the van in front of one of the other ones but we never know when they are going to decide to park back there and it‚Äôs not like they can‚Äôt use the street in front of their house to park their car too. We have always parked our vehicles in the back. Another issue is the fact that they have all these people staying with them so they have trucks and crap in their driveway so they can‚Äôt park there. The whole situation drives me nuts. Our driveway is gravel and the city has rules that says that if a driveway is gravel it‚Äôs not considered a driveway so our landlord wanted to pave it and I guess the neighbors wouldn‚Äôt go for it. Just drama drama drama over a dumb driveway. We honestly have no other place to park our vehicles except for the road. They have a new garage and driveway they could be using. 
Well here are some pics from the wonderful blizzard in our area.
this is not too long after the blizzard started

the garage you see is the neighbor‚Äôs old one and i was taking a pic of the snow built up on the side of my van
near the front of my van

the sled i used to gauge how much snow we got. This was at 12 midnight
12 noon my dog coco trying to walk in the snow lol
the sled at 12 noon the next day
this is our driveway 12 noon the next day 
<a href="http://s597.photobucket.com/albums/tt54/kaceysmom2004/scenic/winter/?action=view&current=winter2011blizzard041.jpg” target=‚Äù_blank‚Äù>our backyard
